messages.subject: Re: : from Noni411...VicHi Vic
messages.msgSnippet: Yeah, so he says!!! When I married DH, I had my life all planned out!  I was NEVER going to have kids!  I was going to become a nurse and then maybe own a
messages.messageBody:
Yeah, so he says!!!

When I married DH, I had my life all planned out! I was NEVER going to have kids! I was going to become a nurse and then maybe own a business or become a doctor when I burned out of nursing.....then I accidentally became pregnant and EVERYTHING changed! After I held that little baby in my arms, I decided that I was going to devote my whole life to her! I quit college (just a few classes shy of a degree) and work (I did help DH from time to time in his business) and stayed home with my baby and have been here ever since!
Kim


From: "Valerie" <valfitz@...>
Subject: Re: : from Noni411...VicHi Vic,

Kim, I bet he depends on you just as much as you depend on him! :-)

--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., "Kim" <sinclai@E...> wrote:
> That is good to know! I sooo thought that by me not having a
career, I was telling my girls that the only way to be happy was to
depend on a man! Although I do wish I would have graduated from
college first before starting my family!
> Kim



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
